thread.title: Emotional fans praise Michael Bublé's new music video | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Emotional fans praise Michael Bublé's new music video | Daily Mail Online

author: Ekin Karasin For Mailonline
title: Emotional fans praise Michael Bublé's new music video | Daily Mail Online
text: 'This gave me chills!': Emotional fans praise Michael Bublé's new video about 'everlasting love'... as he makes his musical comeback amid his son Noah's cancer battle Michael, 41, shared his video I Believe In You on Friday about a couple in love The touching story follows the life of two young children who grow old together Fans called it 'heartwarming' and many admitted they were reduced to tears It comes as Michael revealed his son Noah, 3, is 'progressing well' with his liver cancer treatment and doctors are 'very optimistic' about his future Published: 20:56 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 01:28 GMT, 11 February 2017 219 shares
